meaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> sitting on a <radical>stool</radical> with a broken <radical>heart</radical> is very <kanji>angry</kanji>. She had her heart broken by some jerk and now she’s sitting on the stool, just stewing over the guy and how angry she is with him.
readingMnemonic: As you're sitting on that stool feeling <kanji>angry</kanji>, your <reading>do</reading>g (ど) comes up to console you. He nuzzles his head into your lap, and you start to feel the anger melt away.
